Since tomatoes are fruits, why aren't they sweet?

Because they don't like Stefon.

Why wont anyone understand that reference?

Because no one can ever read your mind.

Why is NSA interested in my life?

Because they can't read YOUR mind. Yet.

no, but I've read that old movie.

Well, everyone, didn't you? Of course, noone admits to it in public.

Should I cut the green or the red wire?

How many chips are in a bag?

I dunno (Munch)

Why my rocket always come down?

Because Earth is flat. There are no such things as "orbits". Pfft. You can clearly see the disc shaped shadow on the moon. If it were to go up for ever, it would run against the ceiling. This can't happen, because it would be proof that NASA is lying to us, thus all rockets are equipped with a failure module... It's a conspiracy.

Why aren't Q-cumbers spelled this way?

Because names cannot contain special characters or spaces. Breaks the source code.
